mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NO, CATE_NO,WRITER,TITLE,CONTENT,ENROLL_DATE, DELETE_YN,MODIFY_DATE,HIT,STATUS) VALUES(SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL,#{cateNo},#{writer},#{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE,'N',SYSDATE,0,#{status})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT N.NO,N.CATE_NO, C.NAME as CATE_NAME,N.TITLE,N.ENROLL_DATE, N.HIT, M.NICK AS WRITER,N.CATEGORY,N.KEYWORD FROM NOTICE N JOIN COMMON_CATEGORY C ON N.CATE_NO= C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = N.WRITER WHERE STATUS = 2 AND CATE_NO = #{vo.cateNo} AND DELETE_YN = 'N' ) WHERE ROWNUM<=3
UNION SELECT N.NO,N.CATE_NO,C.NAME as CATE_NAME,N.TITLE,N.ENROLL_DATE, N.HIT, M.NICK AS WRITER ,N.CATEGORY,N.KEYWORD FROM NOTICE N JOIN COMMON_CATEGORY C ON N.CATE_NO= C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = N.WRITER WHERE CATE_NO = ${vo.cateNo} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND ${vo.category} LIKE '%${vo.keyword}%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT N.NO,N.CATE_NO, C.NAME as CATE_NAME,N.TITLE,N.ENROLL_DATE, N.HIT, M.NICK AS WRITER,N.CATEGORY,N.KEYWORD,N.STATUS FROM NOTICE N JOIN COMMON_CATEGORY C ON N.CATE_NO= C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = N.WRITER WHERE STATUS = 2 AND DELETE_YN = 'N' ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
UNION SELECT N.NO,N.CATE_NO,C.NAME as CATE_NAME,N.TITLE,N.ENROLL_DATE, N.HIT, M.NICK AS WRITER ,N.CATEGORY,N.KEYWORD ,N.STATUS FROM NOTICE N JOIN COMMON_CATEGORY C ON N.CATE_NO= C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = N.WRITER WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND ${vo.category} LIKE '%${vo.keyword}%'
SELECT M.NICK AS WRITER ,N.ENROLL_DATE,N.HIT,C.NAME as CATE_NAME,N.TITLE,N.CONTENT FROM NOTICE N JOIN COMMON_CATEGORY C ON N.CATE_NO= C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = N.WRITER WHERE N.NO = #{no}
